title: We Came Here to Forget Book Club
itunes:title: We Came Here to Forget Book Club
description:
For this month’s book club, we’re talking about We Came Here to Forget by Andrea Dunlop. The book follows ex-professional skier, Katie Cleary as she starts a new life in Buenos Aires. Along the way, this book kept us guessing about the dark secret in her past that led her to move away and start a new life. We both devoured this book in one day: Grace needed to find out the shocking truth about Katie’s sister, while Becca was living for Katie’s story of redemption in Argentina—complete with tango lessons and a new, foreign lover.

 

Obsessions:

  • Barefoot Dreams Socks
  • Barefoot Dreams Cardigan
  • Lele Sadoughi x Stoney Clover Lane collab
  • Tuleste Pom Pom Earrings
  • The Body Stone

 

Instagram Obsessions:

  • @bookbaristas
  • @fatpompoms

 

Books Mentioned:

  • We Came Here to Forget by Andrea Dunlop (November Book Club Pick!)
  • Such a Fun Age by Kiley Reid
  • One Day in December by Josie Silver

 

Sponsors: 

 

  • Care/of: 50% your first order at takecareof.com with offer code BOP50 at checkout.
  • Borghese: Get 25% off site wide at borghese.com and enter the code BOP25 at checkout.

 

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

 

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
